bibl.title: Family Matters: Remarks on the Representation of Family Ties in the Dynastic Propaganda of the Ptolemies.
bibl.note: Fathers and Sons: Children of the Gods. - Siblings and Spouses: hieros gamos. - Mothers and Sons: Ruling Queens.
